propertiesMeta.description: The Shadow Offset.

propertiesMeta.name: offsetYUnit
propertiesMeta.description: The Shadow Offset.

propertiesMeta.name: inset
propertiesMeta.description: Inset shadows are drawn inside the border (even transparent ones), above the background, but below content.

propertiesMeta.name: blur
propertiesMeta.description: The larger this value, the bigger the blur, so the shadow becomes bigger and lighter.

propertiesMeta.name: blurUnit
propertiesMeta.description: The larger this value, the bigger the blur, so the shadow becomes bigger and lighter.

propertiesMeta.name: spread
propertiesMeta.description: Positive values will cause the shadow to expand and grow bigger, negative values will cause the shadow to shrink.

propertiesMeta.name: spreadUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Positive values will cause the shadow to expand and grow bigger, negative values will cause the shadow to shrink.

ControlAccessRight.description: An access right which is checked by controls. In the Schema a defaultValue of true mean access is granted, false is denied, null is ask parent.

name.description: Name of the access definition in the HTML.

displayName.description: Name which should be presented the user.

visible.description: Determine if an access definition is shown to the user.

description.description: A long description of this access definition.

defaultValueInternal.description: Defines the default of this control access right. This will be used if the check for this access right does not return a result. true mean access is granted, false is denied, null is ask parent.

injectContextObject.description:
Inject context object.
Call ctx.success() or ctx.error(TcHmi.Errors.ERROR)

waitMode.description: Synchronous: Next step will called after last JavaScript line. Asynchronous: Next step will called after calling ctx.success() or ctx.error(TcHmi.Errors.ERROR)

success.description: Steps which will be called after call of ctx.success() with Asynchronous or last line with Synchronous.

error.description: Steps which will be called after call of ctx.success() with Asynchronous or an exception with Synchronous.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

propertiesMeta.description: Position of the display.

items.title: EventData
items.description: Defines a event for the object.

propertiesMeta.name: activate
propertiesMeta.description: If true the event will be displayed on the UiIcon.

propertiesMeta.name: eventCondition
propertiesMeta.description: BA event condition. If this is used the icon of the event will be selected automatically.

propertiesMeta.name: eventIconState
propertiesMeta.description: BA event icon state. If this is used the icon state of the event will be selected automatically.

propertiesMeta.name: eventCount
propertiesMeta.description: If larger than 0 a small number will be displayed on the event. This indicates the number of active events with the same icon.

propertiesMeta.name: acknowledgeSymbol
propertiesMeta.description: Boolean symbol that should be set to true when event icon was pressed.

propertiesMeta.name: isAcknowledgeable
propertiesMeta.description: If true the event can be clicked, when false it is not enabled.

propertiesMeta.name: icon
propertiesMeta.description: Icon path for the displayed icon if 'EventCondition' and 'EventIconState' is not set.

propertiesMeta.name: enablePulse
propertiesMeta.description: Activates or deactivated the pulse if 'EventCondition' and 'EventIconState' is not set.

propertiesMeta.name: name
propertiesMeta.description: The name of the facade (e.g. west).

propertiesMeta.name: maintenance
propertiesMeta.description: Flag if maintenance is active.

propertiesMeta.name: stormProtection
propertiesMeta.description: Flag if storm protection is active.

propertiesMeta.name: sunProtection
propertiesMeta.description: Flag if sun protection is active.

propertiesMeta.name: thermalAutomatic
propertiesMeta.description: Flag if thermal automatic is active.

propertiesMeta.description: Feedback for the brightness of the light.

propertiesMeta.name: mode
propertiesMeta.description: Mode of the light.

propertiesMeta.name: resetHandMode
propertiesMeta.description: Symbol which is set to true if the hand mode was reseted.

propertiesMeta.description: Mode of the sunblind.

propertiesMeta.name: width
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%), a grow factor (1) or 'auto' (equivalent to grow factor 1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

propertiesMeta.name: widthUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

propertiesMeta.name: widthMode
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the width is taken from the width value or calculated from child controls in this Column.

propertiesMeta.name: maxWidth
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines maximal width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

propertiesMeta.name: minWidth
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines minimal width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

propertiesMeta.name: overflow
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if a control should be fully visible if it is outside of this column.

allOf.title: Width
allOf.description:
Defines width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%), a grow factor (1) or 'auto' (equivalent to grow factor 1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

allOf.title: WidthUnit
allOf.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

allOf.title: WidthMode
allOf.description: Defines if the width is taken from the width value or calculated from child controls in this Column.

allOf.title: MaxWidth
allOf.description:
Defines maximal width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

allOf.title: MinWidth
allOf.description:
Defines minimal width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

allOf.title: Overflow
allOf.description: Defines if a control should be fully visible if it is outside of this column.

TcHmi.Controls.System.TcHmiGrid.Measurem.description:
Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

propertiesMeta.name: height
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines height of the cells of this row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%), a grow factor (1) or 'auto' (equivalent to grow factor 1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

propertiesMeta.name: heightUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

propertiesMeta.name: heightMode
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the height is taken from the height value or calculated from child controls in row.

propertiesMeta.name: maxHeight
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines maximal height of the row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-height overrides height, but min-height overrides max-height.

propertiesMeta.name: minHeight
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines minimal height of the row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-height overrides height, but min-height overrides max-height.

propertiesMeta.name: overflow
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if a control should be fully visible if it is outside of this row.

allOf.title: Height
allOf.description:
Defines height of the cells of this row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%), a grow factor (1) or 'auto' (equivalent to grow factor 1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

allOf.title: HeightUnit
allOf.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

allOf.title: HeightMode
allOf.description: Defines if the height is taken from the height value or calculated from child controls in row.

allOf.title: MaxHeight
allOf.description:
Defines maximal height of the row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-height overrides height, but min-height overrides max-height.

allOf.title: MinHeight
allOf.description:
Defines minimal height of the row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-height overrides height, but min-height overrides max-height.

allOf.title: Overflow
allOf.description: Defines if a control should be fully visible if it is outside of this row.

items.title: MenuItem
items.description: One entry in the navigation bar

propertiesMeta.name: name
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the menu entry

propertiesMeta.name: page
propertiesMeta.description: Page that should be called if the entry was pressed

propertiesMeta.name: parameter
propertiesMeta.description: Free selectable parameter that can be read if the onPageCalled event is called

propertiesMeta.name: subtitle
propertiesMeta.description: Subtitle that is shown in the optional drop-down navigation content

propertiesMeta.name: image
propertiesMeta.description: Optional image that is shown on the left side of the menu entry

propertiesMeta.name: imageWidth
propertiesMeta.description: Width of the image

propertiesMeta.name: imageWidthUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Width unit of the image

propertiesMeta.name: imageHeight
propertiesMeta.description: Height of the image

propertiesMeta.name: imageHeightUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Height unit of the image

propertiesMeta.name: children
propertiesMeta.description: Column entries for the optional drop-down content

propertiesMeta.name: accessRight
propertiesMeta.description: Access rights of the menu entry for user management

items.title: ColumnItem
items.description: One column entry in the drop-down menu

propertiesMeta.name: name
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the column

propertiesMeta.name: showColumnName
propertiesMeta.description: If it is set, the name of the column is shown in the content in bold font.

propertiesMeta.name: children
propertiesMeta.description: Optional page entries for the column

propertiesMeta.name: accessRight
propertiesMeta.description: Access rights of the column entry for user management
